text: @piersmorgan Are you ok? Have you got a temperature? Absolutely hysteria of the highest order. First we're 'ALL GONNA DIE!!! OF COVID19!!!'. Now, are we going to get weeks of 'WE'RE ALL GONNA GET NUKED!!!' Mate, you'd have been shit in the military.
